target.name: downloadzfin_str
target.description: Downloads files for zfin_str to staging area.

target.name: convertzfin_str
target.description: Converts FASTA files for zfin_str into blastable files in the staging area.

target.name: pushzfin_str
target.description: Pushes blast files for zfin_str to production from the staging area.

target.name: revertzfin_str
target.description: Pulls archived blast files from production to the staging area.
